dmca.title: Google DMCA - Anything Truck
dmca.body:
Todd Forret
AnythingTruck.com
2345 4th Avenue
Moline IL 61265

Thursday, September 28, 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints


1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on 

http://www.anythingtruck.com/window_deflectors.mv. An image, 

http://www.anythingtruck.com/images/720-SideWindIllustration.gif, was also copied from 

our site and slightly altered. It may also be found on the infringing Web page.


2. Search Query: Available in the classic tape-on style or the new Snap-In's style!

Infringing Web Page:
http://www.truckchamp.com/index.asp?PageAction=VIEWCATS&Category=243

Infringing Image:
http://www.truckchamp.com/judyproductimages/air%20flow%20illustration_bl.jpg


3. I may be contacted at todd@anythingtruck.com.


4. Infringing Site's Contact Email: customer_service@truckchamp.com


5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as 

allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.


6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and 

that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive 

right that is allegedly infringed.


Respectfully,
Todd Forret
